articles.title: Meta-backed Hupo finds growth after pivot to AI sales coaching from mental wellness
articles.description: Hupo, backed by Meta, pivoted from mental wellness to AI sales coaching for banks and insurers, and secured a $10M Series A led by DST Global
articles.author: Kate Park

articles.title: More than 100 new tech unicorns were minted in 2025 — here they are
articles.description: Using data from Crunchbase and PitchBook, TechCrunch tracked down the VC-backed startups that became unicorns so far this year.
articles.author: Dominic-Madori Davis

articles.title: OpenAI buys tiny health records startup Torch for, reportedly, $100M
articles.description: AI health records startup Torch will be using its tech for OpenAI's new ChatGPT Health, according to co-founder Ilya Abyzov.
articles.author: Julie Bort

articles.title: Hands-on with Bee, Amazon’s latest AI wearable
articles.description: We tried Amazon's new AI wearable Bee. It's not for pro users yet, but more features are expected this year.
articles.author: Sarah Perez
